channel.title: Keith Miyake – Asians in the U.S.

item.title: About the Header Image
item.dc:creator: Keith Miyake
item.description: The header image for this site is a collage of three photos, sourced from the web, which depict three different aspects of Asian American history. From left to right: People protesting the demolition of the International Hotel (I-Hotel), a predominantly Filipino SRO housing facility in the former Manilatown of San Francisco, CA. Japanese American farm […]
item.content:encoded:
The header image for this site is a collage of three photos, sourced from the web, which depict three different aspects of Asian American history.

From left to right:

People protesting the demolition of the International Hotel (I-Hotel), a predominantly Filipino SRO housing facility in the former Manilatown of San Francisco, CA.

Photo credit: Eddie Foronda, via foundsf.org

Japanese American farm workers in San Leandro, CA, ten days before being forcefully removed to WWII relocation centers.

Photo credit: Dorothea Lange [Public domain], via Wikimedia Commons

Members of New York’s Desis Rising Up and Moving (DRUM NYC) at a rally for immigration reform and an end to racial and religious profiling, surveillance, detention, deportation, and harassment.

Photo credit: DRUM NYC http://www.drumnyc.org/

item.title: How to use the course blog
item.dc:creator: Keith Miyake
item.description: This post will be updated with more details later, but for some basics, check out these two links: How-to guide on creating new posts in wordpress: http://codex.wordpress.org/Writing_Posts A short video covering the same topic: http://wordpress.tv/2009/01/15/writing-and-publishing-a-post/ To insert media files into your post: http://en.support.wordpress.com/category/media/ To insert a gallery of images: http://en.support.wordpress.com/images/gallery/   Super simple example: To embed a youtube […]
item.content:encoded:
This post will be updated with more details later, but for some basics, check out these two links:

How-to guide on creating new posts in wordpress: http://codex.wordpress.org/Writing_Posts

A short video covering the same topic: http://wordpress.tv/2009/01/15/writing-and-publishing-a-post/

To insert media files into your post: http://en.support.wordpress.com/category/media/

To insert a gallery of images: http://en.support.wordpress.com/images/gallery/

 

Super simple example: To embed a youtube video, just insert the link to the youtube page, e.g. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hWUV9fyc4Rc and your video will magically appear:
